trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class defines the signing date and time of a signature.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> define a data e hora de uma assinatura.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> object can be used as an authenticated attribute of a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> object when an authenticated date and time are to accompany a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> pode ser usado como um atributo autenticado de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> quando uma data e hora autenticadas precisarem acompanhar uma assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A signing time attribute is also available in CAPICOM.
trans-unit.target: Um atributo de tempo de assinatura também está disponível no CAPICOM.

trans-unit.source: See [CAPICOM_ATTRIBUTE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa375631.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [CAPICOM_ATTRIBUTE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa375631.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> classe tem os seguintes valores de propriedade padrão.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: Valor padrão

trans-unit.source: The current date and time
trans-unit.target: A data e hora atuais

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a specific date and time for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser especificar uma determinada data e hora para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> de objeto, use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29> construtor.

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that specifies the encoded signing date and time of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de valores de byte que especifica a data e hora de assinatura codificadas da mensagem CMS/PKCS nº 7.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.Byte[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class by using the specified array of byte values as the encoded signing date and time of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.Byte[])" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> usando a matriz especificada de valores de byte como a data e hora de assinatura codificadas do conteúdo de uma mensagem CMS/PKCS nº 7.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> structure that represents the signing date and time of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que representa a data e hora da assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.DateTime)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class by using the specified signing date and time.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.DateTime)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> usando a data e hora de assinatura especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object from which to copy information.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> do qual copiar as informações.

trans-unit.source: Copies information from a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Copia informações de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" />.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> objeto com especificado <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime" /> property retrieves a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> structure that represents the date and time that the message was signed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime" /> recupera uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que representa a data e hora em que a mensagem foi assinada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> structure that contains the date and time the document was signed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> estrutura que contém a data e hora que o documento foi assinado.
